Noun: the result of good upbringing (especially knowledge of correct social behavio)
Verb: undergo training or instruction in preparation for a particular role, function, or profession
educate for a future role or function
teach or refine to be discriminative in taste or judgment
point or cause to go (blows, weapons, or objects such as photographic equipmen)
exercise in order to prepare for an event or competition
cause to grow in a certain way by tying and pruning it
drag loosely along a surface; allow to sweep the ground
